scripts.install:win32: IF exist .\src\osu-performance ( cd src\osu-performance && git pull && cd ..\.. ) ELSE ( git clone --recursive https://github.com/ppy/osu-performance src/osu-performance ) && node inst.js && node-gyp rebuild
scripts.install:darwin:linux: git clone --recursive https://github.com/ppy/osu-performance src/osu-performance 2>/dev/null || (cd src/osu-performance ; git pull ; cd ../..) && node inst.js && node-gyp rebuild
